data.message: Currently my whole "'Facebook-Account & Facebook-Newsfeed" is continuing to seriously experience a multitude of horrendous dilemmas{Technical-Difficulties, etc.) during this long weekend. Also vastly tremendous dysfunctions{Glitch based Maladies, etc.) has further appeared throughout my "Facebook-Account & Facebook-Newsfeed" in a grotesquely troublesome fashion. Additionally I am continuously encountering bad complications that's making it hard to properly operate my entire "Facebook-Account & Facebook-Newsfeed" on a daily basis. Anyway Facebook Administrators, I really need Facebook to broadly address these "Specified Circumstances" mentioned in my message today{April.16,2016) concerning what I've encountered. Lastly Facebook Administrators, "PLEASE" can U help{SOS) me out by providing a urgent resolution{FIXES, etc.) capable of fully remedying those "Problematic Matters" effecting me on Facebook.
